author: Margaret Cousins
message: Appreciation can make a day, even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.
title: Thought of the day

message: Every sixty seconds you spend angry, upset or mad, is a full minute of happiness you will never get back.
title: Thought of the day

author: Thomas Carlyle
message: This world, after all our science and sciences, is still a miracle; wonderful, inscrutable, magical and more, to whosoever will think of it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Pearl Buck
message: Every great mistake has a halfway moment, a split second when it can be recalled and perhaps remedied.
title: Thought of the day
